#### [Government](https://anahuac.us/government/agendas-and-minutes/#collapseOne)

* [City Council](https://anahuac.us/government/city-council/)
* [City Documents](https://anahuac.us/government/city-documents/)
* [Code of Ordinances](https://library.municode.com/tx/anahuac/codes/code_of_ordinances)
* [Elections](https://anahuac.us/government/elections/)
* [Financial Transparency](https://anahuac.us/government/financial-transparency/)
* [Greetings from the Mayor](https://anahuac.us/government/greetings-from-the-mayor/)
* [Public Meeting Calendar](https://anahuac.us/events/)
* [Public Notices](https://anahuac.us/government/public-notices/)

* Agendas are listed on the
  [Website Calendar](https://anahuac.us/events/)
  . If you believe there is a posting error, or you have a question pertaining to the information on this page, please contact
  [City Hall](https://anahuac.us/departments/)
  .
* All Agendas are posted 72 hours prior to the meeting. Notices which must be advertised are published in the Official City Paper.
* Completed minutes are usually available a month after the meeting date, allowing time for review, adoption, and posting of the final version.
* For a complete listing of all meetings schedules, please see the
  [Website Calendar](https://anahuac.us/events/)
  or the
  [Public Notices Page.](https://anahuac.us/government/public-notices/)
* If you would like to have agendas, minutes and or other City information emailed to you, please Contact
  [City Hall](https://anahuac.us/departments/)
  .
* To have an item placed on an agenda or have any questions, please contact
  [City Hall](https://anahuac.us/departments/)
  .

This budget will raise more revenue from property taxes than last year’s budget by an amount of $6,838.00, which is a .0096 increase from last year’s budget. The property tax revenue to be raised from new property added to the tax roll this year is $70,742.
